casebody.data:
No. 10-114. Ricky D. Fox, Petitioner v. Billy Ray Vice, Chief of Police for the Town of Vinton, et al. 562 U.S. 1282, 131 S. Ct. 1672,

179 L. Ed. 2d 522,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2104. March 18, 2011.

Motion to substitute Judy Ann Vice, as Executrix of the Estate of Billy Ray Vice, as respondent in place of Billy Ray Vice granted.
